Articles.Content: Having a quit to desktop action in the pause menu when playing or having a button to do this in the debug menu will make quiting the game that bit easier and less risk of harming any game files when closing rh app from the desktop.
Seconding this. Having the ability to quit straight to desktop would be quite useful in situations where you have to be leaving now and don't want to or can't just leave the game running.
I've just started using Alt-F4 because it takes so long to exit manually
